subject: Building, deploying and testing an industrial Linux platform
summary: To introduce a robust, secure and reliable platform for the industrial environments is a key challenge. Therefore, running with the industrial-grade Linux distribution to fulfill the requirements mentioned above is imperative. The Linux distribution includes the Linux kernel and user space. Based on this testing design, the distribution will be built, deployed and tested in the device under automatic test by using continuous integration development practice to withstand the harsh industrial environments. In this presentation, SZ Lin will introduce how the industrial-grade Linux distribution is built, deployed and tested without human intervention, and review the test scope in both Linux kernel and user space. In addition, he will also address the design architecture of 24/7 long-term automated testing in all device under test with each release of new update.

subject: ké--ê - Property Testing in JavaScript
summary:
Property-based testing makes you think your code harder.
 
 
 Rather than checking the results with specific input, properties are asserted (“for any possible input, [some condition] should hold”),
 and a test runner searches for counter-examples. Typically, if it finds a combination of arguments that causes the property to fail,
 it then searches for simpler versions of those arguments that still fail, and then prints the minimal failing input.
 
 
 This talk will introduce ké—ê project, property-based test library, highly inspired by QuickCheck, jsverify and
 why should you consider using property-based testing in your JavaScript projects.

summary:
天文學是一門很古老的學科。不過仰賴於二十世紀開始的物理新發現，還有新的觀測技術，甚至有了電腦可以輔助運算，現今的天文科學才能有各項突破的進展。

 這個分享裡，我會分享一下天文研究和業餘天文觀測的差別，天文研究中會運用到的技術，還有目前跟學弟一起進行的的小專案。也歡迎大家分享對天文這個學門有什麼疑問和想法，隨性聊天都可以呀，不要問我占星術就好，那個我不會啊 XD

許多 RDBMS 諸如 PostgreSQL 或者 MySQL 皆有將程式碼開放出來給大家學習，可是在沒有任何基礎的情況下，突然看到大量複雜且高度優化的程式碼，往往讓學習者敬而遠之。 

這個演講的目標在於介紹一個完全由台灣人所開發的教學型資料庫系統，VanillaDB。該系統以 IBM 經典的 System R 架構為基礎建起，並實作了許多著名且自今仍是 state-of-the-art 的演算法，例如：ARIES Recovery、Strict Two Phase Locking ... 等等。為了教學導向，內部盡可能地避免過於複雜的優化，並用模組化來確立分工。

演講將先給大家動機，思考一下為什麼看一個 RDBMS 的原始碼對自己有幫助，無論你是否是研究資料庫系統的人。接下來稍微介紹一些 RDBMS 的基礎知識，再帶大家看一下一個 SQL Query 是如何在我們的架構下被執行的。接著簡單地介紹一些在開發這類系統上需要考量的問題。最後帶大家了解 VanillaDB 專案的全貌，以及由我們所設計、可以搭配學習的教材。

subject: Introduction to MySQL Group Replication
summary: The MySQL Group Replication feature is a multi-master update anywhere replication plugin for MySQL with built-in conflict detection and resolution, automatic distributed recovery, and group membership. MySQL released GA version of Group Replication plugin on Dec 12 2012 (MySQL 5.7.17).MySQL Group Replication provides distributed state machine replication with strong coordination between servers. Servers coordinate themselves automatically when they are part of the same group. The group can operate in a single-primary mode with automatic primary election, where only one server accepts updates at a time. Alternatively, for more advanced users the group can be deployed in multi-primary mode, where all servers can accept updates, even if they are issued concurrently. There is a built-in group membership service that keeps the view of the group consistent and available for all servers at any given point in time.

 此框架 open source 於：https://github.com/Canner/coren
 
 讓你可以把 Server-side Render 邏輯放到 Component 中，面對多變的情況都可以迎刃而解

community: The Art of Conducting Open Community 開放社群經營藝術
subject: 從社群到人民團體
summary:
社群組織到達一定規模，就可能產生成立團體的想法。成立一個正式組織帶來的便利，可能使人忽略背後的可能成本。本議程將從三個面向，分享社群主持人轉換到正式人民團體組織時，可能遭遇的問題：
 
 1. 財務：方便募款通常是社群組織正式化的誘因，然而成立人民團體，隱藏的財務成本卻可能對社群造成隱憂。
 2. 權力：人民團體的權力架構受限於法令，與社群的習慣有所不同。社群的核心人物應該如何去分配位置，千萬不要弄錯。
 3. 行政：人民團體的行政工作會產生哪些人力時間的成本，在社群的運作中可能不會被發現。
 
 在經驗分享之外，本議程目的不在勸阻團體的成立，因此也將提出建議，讓換軌的陣痛期降低，或是思考可能的改善行動。

subject: Introduction to Memory-Style Storage in Linux
summary:
Memory-Style Storage (MSS) is emerging as persistent memory technologies advance. By attaching the persistent memories directly to memory bus, we enjoy DRAM-like latency and storage-like persistency.
 
 However, file systems were originally designed to tolerate slow medias such as hard drives and SSDs. Many layers and components had been added into the file system stack to bridge the performance gaps between processor and storage. However, with the sub-micro-second latency offered by persistent memory, those components are becoming new bottlenecks in the stack.
 
 In this talk, I will first introduce What and Why of persistent memory as storage system, and How Linux file systems evolved to embrace this new technology. Secondly, I will discuss several research proposals from the community aiming at further maximizing the performance of file systems on persistent memory.

subject: BSDMIZER: a framework to improve FreeBSD continuously
summary: We propose a framework, bsdmizer, to continuously improve FreeBSD performance. It leverages existing building and testing infrastructure, along with DTrace to drive compilers trying variant flag sequences, and leads to optimal release image. As more time we invest, the image continuously becomes better and better, in execution time or in code size, depending on the direction of performance test cases. We have already accelerated /usr/bin/bzip2 to 55%, and we will soon apply bsdmizer on the other critical libraries and kernel, esp. network part. The resulting optimal compilation flag sequences will be available as a source build option. In our imagination, bsdmizer will create a new development cycle: Heroes write performance test cases first, bsdmizer feedbacks effective compiler flag sequences, and then all people gain performance improvement at the happy end.

summary: 區塊鏈技術是否應申請專利？國際上區塊鏈專利申請之狀況如何？區塊鏈專利是否可能獲准，從而減緩甚或危及區塊鏈之創新？是本演講關注之議題。本人檢索發現國際上已核准公告之區塊鏈專利尚屬有限，但已有不少公開但尚未核准公告之專利申請案。這些專利如果獲准，勢必對區塊鏈技術之發展帶來負面之影響。雖然美國最高法院於 2014 年之 Alice 案幾乎宣告軟體與電子商務方法專利之死刑，然依據聯邦巡迴上訴法院於 2016 年 Enfish 案之見解，一件發明若有改變資料庫結構，從而提高電腦運作之效能，例如提升電腦「將資料寫入記憶體」以及「自記憶體中擷取資料」之效能，可被認定具有專利適格性而非僅是抽象思想。區塊鏈本身可視為一種新的點對點之分散式資料庫，其技術大幅提升電腦與網際網路「將資料寫入記憶體」以及「自記憶體中擷取資料」之效能，而非僅是使用「通常電腦」來執行電腦程式，故具有通過 Alice 案二段測試法之可能性。準此，「以太坊」創辦人 Vitalik Buterin 對於專利將阻礙區塊鏈創新之擔憂，確實有可能發生。他創設「以太坊」並將所有軟體以開放原始碼方式供人免費使用，確實是區塊鏈產業有可能成形並於這一年來急速發展之關鍵。倘如此胸襟與美意未來竟導致「以太坊」之後續創新受制於他人所申請之專利權，無疑是智慧財產制度的最大諷刺。屆時，或許就是我們重新省思智慧財產制度的的最佳時機。

summary:
In this talk, we will briefly go through each project in OpenStack and give some guideline for the developers who are the beginners in OpenStack. It is an open source project for Cloud IaaS development. It began in 2010 as a joint project of Rackspace Hosting and NASA. It is a cloud operating system that controls large pools of compute, storage, and networking resources throughout a datacenter, all managed through a dashboard that gives administrators control while empowering their users to provision resources through a web interface. It has 9 catalogs including Compute, Storage, Network, Data & Analytics, Security, Management Tools, Deployment Tools, Application Services, and Monitoring & Metering. Two summits are hosted in each year. OpenStack is one of specialized projects to be near production ready in current Open Source Community. We will illustrate how OpenStack is a production ready through its strict process of contribution and the comprehensive CI (Continuous Integration)/CD (Continuous Delivery) processes.
 To do this, we take Cinder as an example. It is one of the core projects in penStack. It handles block based storage systems. It can integrate different kinds of storage solutions by using drivers, for example, ITRI DISCO and Ceph. Besides, high level design of Cinder including the different features it supports will also be talked.

subject: Marshal 不給你的, 自己來
summary:
Golang 雖然有相當完整的 struct serialize 與 deserialize 功能。
但是在預設情形下，定義好 struct field 的資料型態，就等於確定了 serialize 後得到的資料格式。
這對於文字表示方式有多種方法的常用資料型態 (如 time.Time) 相當不方便。
雖然可以重新定義 field 型態，進而改變 struct field 的 serialize 方式。
但是對於相同資料型態，卻得在不同 struct 內產生不同的 serialized 資料的場合，依然相當不方便。
本 topic 將向 Golang 新手介紹如何修改 Marshal/Unmarshal method，讓不同 struct 內的同型態 field，能夠依需求 serialize 成不同的資料表示格式。

subject: DevOps 人一定要知道的 Ansible & GitLab CI 持續交付技巧
summary:
Ansible 是個與 Puppet, Salt, Chef 並列的 Infrastructure as Code 組態設定工具，其簡單易用的特性更讓人愛不釋手；GitLab 是業界很常見的 Git 私有版本控制服務，搭配其 GitLab CI 將能快速建立屬於自己的 CI/CD Pipeline 與自動化部署。
 
 本次凍仁將會藉由 Ansible 和 GitLab 帶領大家一探持續部署的世界和 DevOps 的威力！
